BLOCK.QRY: INSERT INTO PIST_EMP_CERTIFICATE_DTL (STR_EMP_NO, NUM_SL_NO, NUM_CERTF_ID, STR_APPICABILITY, STR_SUBMIT_STATUS, STR_FILE_OR_PAGE_NO, STR_REMARKS,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE, GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID, GDT_EFFECT_DATE, GDT_ENTRY_DATE, GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID,GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
DELETE FROM PIST_EMP_CERTIFICATE_DTL A WHERE A.STR_EMP_NO=? AND A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE PIST_EMP_CERTIFICATE_DTL A SET A.GNUM_ISVALID=0 WHERE A.STR_EMP_NO=? AND A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
